channel.title: Citrix on ROP-Lobsters
channel.description: Recent content in Citrix on ROP-Lobsters

item.title: #19: SolarWinds Deep Dive: What Happened? Then and Now
item.description: ROP-E19: HTML5 Audio ^ Join Austin and Nathan as they discuss the historic hack of SolarWinds. How did it happen? Why was it special? Why are we still talking about it? They’ll also discuss some of the recent legal and administrative proceedings around the fallout from the attack. Listen in!

item.title: #15: Citrix Backdoors, Post Quantum Crypto, Anti-bot AI, and Security for Kids
item.description: ROP-E15: HTML5 Audio ^ Austin and Nathan are back at it! This time they discuss a current epidemic of citrix device backdoor installations, and some recent publications detailing hopeful post-quantum cryptographic solutions. They also discuss the ways some are using AI to fight botnets and current efforts to give cyber security license training to students.
